name: 👾 Pexel - Social Media Kit 👾
description:
A Canva style Social Media Kit for creating quick social media creatives. The following are included in the kit:


🌌 40+ Fully Customizable Templates

⚙️ 80+ Components including CTAs, Offer, Branding, Background etc.

🏔️ 100+ Font and Color Styles

⛏️ 10+ Plugin recommendation


All the templates are fully compatible with Facebook guidelines.


✅ How to use it:

Duplicate the file and publish it in your team library to use it across your team.


I hope you will love it. Please share your feedback in the comment💖
